drawnet.lib.filters
Class XMLModelFilter

java.lang.Object
  drawnet.lib.filters.Filter
      drawnet.lib.filters.XMLFilter
          drawnet.lib.filters.XMLModelFilter

public class XMLModelFilter
extends XMLFilter

A filter to read/write models in XML format (current format).

read

public Model read()
Reads a XML file containing a model definition. setFilenameAssoc("mdl", [filename.mdl]) must be invoked before calling this method, otherwise a null pointer is returned.

Returns:
a Model or null if filename has not been set

loadInstanceDefinition

public ElementInstance loadInstanceDefinition(java.lang.String elemFilename,
                                              ElementType elType)
Loads an ElementInstance definition from a file (used for default instances creation). It is invoked by XMLFormalismFilter.makeDefaults()

Parameters:
elemFilename - the input filename (full path)
elType - the ElementType of the instance lo load (checks the loaded definition). This instance is set as the default instance within this ElementType (in makeDefaults()).
Returns:
the ElementInstance defined in the input file

saveInstanceDefinition

public boolean saveInstanceDefinition(java.lang.String filename,
                                      ElementInstance elInstance)
Saves an ElementInstance definition to file.

Parameters:
filename - the output filename (full path)
elInstance - the ElementInstance to save
Returns:
true on success, false otherwise
Since:
2007.12.07

write

public void write(Model m)
Writes a XML file containing a model definition. setFilenameAssoc("mdl", [filename.mdl]) must be invoked before calling this method, otherwise nothing is written.

Parameters:
m - the model to write
